text: This remarkable man of medicine, whom Sir Francis Burdett described to Anglesey a year or two later as 'more like a God upon earth than a human being' had an increasing number of disciples among unorthodox medical men in the cities of Europe: One of these was the Neapolitan, Dr Giuseppe Mauro, whom Anglesey consulted in 1834.
